text: The Lost People is a 1949 British drama movie directed by Bernard Knowles and Muriel Box and was based on the play Cockpit by Bridget Boland. It stars Dennis Price, Mai Zetterling, Richard Attenborough, Maxwell Reed, William Hartnell, Siobh√°n McKenna, Gerard Heinz, Zena Marshall, Olaf Pooley, Harcourt Williams, Jill Balcon, Grey Blake. ==Other websites== * Category:1949 drama movies Category:British drama movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Bernard Knowles Category:Movies directed by Muriel Box Category:Movies set in Germany
title: The Lost People
